long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our innovative Chrome extension lets you customize your start page just the way you want. By clicking the right mouse button, you can change the background of the start page and select a search engine that is convenient for you.(qooint, google, bing, yahoo, yandex) You can add your own search engines for greater convenience.
